data.title: Walls Down at Mickey Shorts Theater; Sneak Peek at Potatoland Photo Op
data.meta_description: Walt Disney World news, photos, and reviews! We provide you with daily news from the Walt Disney World theme parks and beyond
data.meta_site_name: BlogMickey.com - Disney World News, Photos, and Info
data.text:
Walls are down today at the Mickey Shorts Theater in Disney’s Hollywood Studios. The theater opens to guests tomorrow, but select invited media are getting a preview today. Disney also released a look inside the theater.

We made it out to Disney’s Hollywood Studios to see what we could and give you a sneak peek at the soon-to-be-popular Potatoland photo op at the exit to the theater! Here’s a look around.

The exit doors to the attraction opened briefly, giving us a peek inside at the Potatoland photo op.

For continuing coverage of the changes coming to Disney’s Hollywood Studios tomorrow, keep checking back with us here at BlogMickey.com!
